title: Build an eCommerce Site with Angular 5
headline: Learn everything you need to build an effective Angular 5 eCommerce website in this free online training course.
description: This free online course, "Build an eCommerce Site with Angular 5", teaches students how to use the tools in Angular 5 to build a site for the eCommerce business. It provides a demonstration of Angular's tools and code editor. Students will also learn about adding routing to app.module.ts. You will also learn about proper page layout. So, why wait? Start this course today and learn about building an eCommerce site with Angular 5.
courseDescription:
This course will help to build an eCommerce website using Angular 5 to provide you with an understanding of the process of creating a project in Angular and how to use code to add products for an eCommerce website builder. You will revive a detailed demonstration of how to create an eCommerce website with the tools provided by Angular. You will be able to explain Angular 5's tools and code editor. You will also learn about initializing a new angular project.

This Angular 5 eCommerce site course then explains how to add routing to app.module.ts. The course will cover completing routing functionality. You will also learn about organizing your eCommerce site to make it user friendly while still keeping a strong online presence.

This course then wraps up the proper page layout. You will learn about proper page layouts for the main site, the home page, and carousel. This course will also cover turning on routing and creating the products page. By taking this course you will learn about how to use the tools in Angular 5 to build an eCommerce website for your business that is functional and user friendly. So why wait? Get started today.
